meanings.definition: A written or printed work consisting of multiple pages.
meanings.sent1: I read many interesting texts in my school library.
meanings.sent2: The library has a wide variety of texts for students to borrow.
meanings.sent3: The texts in the library are like a treasure trove of knowledge waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a library filled with texts of wisdom and imagination.
meanings.sent5: The texts in the library whispered stories of the past and dreams of the future.

meanings.definition: The words of a speech or script.
meanings.sent1: The actor memorized his texts for the play.
meanings.sent2: The texts of the speech were powerful and moving.
meanings.sent3: The texts of the play made the audience laugh and cry at the same time.
meanings.sent4: His texts were like music to the ears of the audience.
meanings.sent5: The texts of the script painted vivid images in the minds of the actors.

meanings.definition: A message sent electronically, typically via a mobile phone.
meanings.sent1: She received a text from her friend inviting her to a party.
meanings.sent2: Sending texts is a quick and convenient way to communicate.
meanings.sent3: Her phone buzzed with a text from her mischievous sibling.
meanings.sent4: The text she received was like a virtual hug from a distance.
meanings.sent5: The text notification lit up her face with a smile.
